hero.description: Knowsy is the multiplayer game that brings people together through fun, interactive challenges. Guess your friends' favorites, share laughs, and discover what you really know about each other!
hero.heroImageAlt: Friends playing Knowsy together with colorful game cards

features.title: Why Knowsy?
features.subtitle: More than just a game - it's a platform that connects people, brands, and insights
features.learnAboutFriendsDesc: Discover your friends' favorites and deepen connections through engaging gameplay
features.brandEngagementDesc: Advertisers reach audiences through fun, contextually relevant game experiences
features.marketResearchDesc: Every game generates valuable choice-modeling data about player preferences
features.whiteLabelDesc: Organizations can create custom-branded versions for their communities
features.heading: A game about you, your people, and the hilarious truths between you.
features.description: Wholesome, funny, and perfect for game nights, travel, dorms, and parties. Colorful, feel-good, and full of topics the whole crew can enjoy anytime, anywhere.

gameOverview.title: How Knowsy Works
gameOverview.subtitle: Simple, fun, and endlessly entertaining
gameOverview.playersDesc: Perfect for small groups and parties
gameOverview.topicsDesc: Unlimited topics to keep games fresh
gameOverview.pointsDesc: Play 3 rounds to complete the game
gameOverview.easySetupDesc: Start playing in under a minute

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about playing Knowsy
faq.q1: How many players can join a game?
faq.a1: Knowsy supports 2-6 players per game. You can play with friends online or in person using the same device.
faq.q2: How long does a game typically last?
faq.a2: A typical game lasts 15-30 minutes, depending on the number of players. The first player to reach 30 points wins!
faq.q3: Do I need to download anything?
faq.a3: No! Knowsy is a web-based game that works directly in your browser on any device. Just visit the site and start playing.
faq.q4: Can I play with people remotely?
faq.a4: Yes! Share your room code with friends and they can join from anywhere. Perfect for virtual game nights.
faq.q5: How does the VIP selection work?
faq.a5: Each round, a different player becomes the VIP. They select a topic and secretly rank their top 5 choices. Other players try to guess their preferences in the correct order.
